thread.title: Angel J.
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Angel J.

author: Angel J.
title: Angel J.
text: I really like using this site. Not every bundle is spectacular but often times bundles have a game or two on my wish list and some more interesting additions, and with affordable prices its easy to just snatch them up. Keys come quickly after purchasing and I've never had a problem redeeming them. Overall very good!
